localString.value: Bred for use as spies and messengers in the Underdark, these former Intellect Devourers are virtually unkillable, though they no longer retain their psionic abilities.
Low and flat, this chest seems to have been designed for the storage and filing of a merchant's accounts.

Crafted by the half-insane monks of the Southern Wastes, these robes are highly sought.
Unfortunately, some of the insanity from these monks was magically transferred to the robes, making the wearer significantly more likely to put themselves in situations that will lead to certain death. They are also a little tight, causing the pressure behind your eyes to increase a little and making it a little harder to see.
This will block portalling into the area via the temple portal and out of the area via the pendant. Place anywhere in the area to be protected.
Might this take you from this horrid place and send you back to Nordock?
A portal glows softly before you. You can hear the moans of the damned emanating from within.
